name: Single Room
desc: A room assigned to one person. May have one or more beds.

name: Double Room
desc: A room assigned to two people. May have one or more beds.

name: Triple Room
desc: A room assigned to three people. May have two or more beds.

name: Quad Room
desc: A room assigned to four people. May have two or more beds.

name: Queen Room
desc: A room with a queen-sized bed. May be occupied by one or more people.

name: Master Suite
desc: A parlour or living room connected to one or more bedrooms.
